name: JDUtils
summary: A collection of Objective-C class categories and useful methods for iOS development
description: See https://www.omnifi.co.uk/labs/grow-your-own-cocoapo for more information and instructions.

xcconfig.GCC_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS: $(inherited) JD_LOGO_FONT='@"Helvetica-Neue"' JD_APP_BOLD_FONT='@"Helvetica-Neue"' JD_APP_FONT='@"Helvetica-Neue"' JD_APP_LIGHT_FONT='@"Helvetica-Neue"' JD_BLACK_COLOR='@"#000000"' JD_WHITE_COLOR='@"#FFFFFF"' JD_DARK_GREY_COLOR='@"#333333"' JD_GREY_COLOR='@"#555555"' JD_SEMI_LIGHT_GREY_COLOR='@"#CCCCCC"' JD_LIGHT_GREY_COLOR='@"#DDDDDD"' JD_REALLY_LIGHT_GREY_COLOR='@"#E5E5E5"' JD_NAVBAR_HEIGHT='44'
